page.title: 20Recreation in Much Wenlock.
page.content: {The Bowling Club}was formed in{1978 and has between{40 and 60 members}aged 11 to 78. They play locally in Much Wenlock most evenings and Saturday, Sunday and Bank holiday afternoons. Some members bowl competitively against other clubs. {The Cricket Club}was formed in{1870. They have about{35 playing members whose ages range from 13 to 50. They play every Saturday, from April to September in The Shropshire County League and friendly fixtures on Saturdays. {The Ramblers' Association}has{45 {members}aged 8-78. Apart from walks every 2 weeks they also clear foot paths and do rights of way marking. {The Gardening Club}has{60 members. Their ages range from 18 to 70 and they have meetings every fourth Thursday of the month.
